text: Is anyone familiar with the manner in which HubSpot’s <http://app.HubSpot.com|app.HubSpot.com> communicates with the primary domain (Such that the login bar and user data is sessioned across the primary when user has logged in)? Is everything Hubpot native CMS with HubDB driving user logins and data?
somehow I imagine “open dialog” can sometimes mean _heated debate_ lol
